title: Released wolkenkit 3.1.0 ğŸ¦„
content: Today, we have released wolkenkit 3.1.0. The new version improves handling persistent data. For details see the [changelog](https://docs.wolkenkit.io/3.1.0/getting-started/updating-wolkenkit/changelog/).

title: Released wolkenkit 3.0.0 ğŸ¦„
content: Today, we have released wolkenkit 3.0.0. The new version provides a rewritten file storage, and import/export commands. It now also runs on Node.js 10.13.0. For details see the [changelog](https://docs.wolkenkit.io/3.0.0/getting-started/updating-wolkenkit/changelog/).

title: Published talk on DDD, event-sourcing and CQRS at the International JavaScript Conference 2018 ğŸ¦„
content: Today, Golo Roden was giving a talk on DDD, event-sourcing and CQRS at the International JavaScript Conference 2018. The recording of this talk has now been published. For details see the [videos](https://docs.wolkenkit.io/latest/media/online-resources/videos/) section.

title: Published Webmontag Kassel talk on DDD and wolkenkit ğŸŠ
content: Ten days ago, Golo Roden was giving a talk on DDD and wolkenkit at the Webmontag Kassel. The recordings of this talk have now been published. For details see the [videos](https://docs.wolkenkit.io/latest/media/online-resources/videos/) section.

title: Published MNUG talk on DDD and wolkenkit ğŸ‰
content: About two weeks ago, Golo Roden was giving a talk on DDD and wolkenkit at the Munich Node.js user group (MNUG). The recordings of this talk have now been published. For details see the [videos](https://docs.wolkenkit.io/latest/media/online-resources/videos/) section.

title: Released wolkenkit 2.0.0 ğŸ¦„
content: Today, we have released wolkenkit 2.0.0. The new version supports async/await, and comes with better IE11 compatibility. For details see the [changelog](https://docs.wolkenkit.io/2.0.0/getting-started/updating-wolkenkit/changelog/).

title: Released wolkenkit 1.2.0 ğŸ¦„
content: Today, we have released wolkenkit 1.2.0. The new version now supports Node.js 8.9.1, so you can use async and await in your code. For the details see the [changelog](https://docs.wolkenkit.io/1.2.0/getting-started/updating-wolkenkit/changelog/).

title: Released episode 3 of the tech:lounge video course on wolkenkit ğŸŠ
content: Today, we have released the third episode of the tech:lounge video course on wolkenkit. To watch the video head over to [techlounge.io/wolkenkit](https://www.techlounge.io/wolkenkit).

title: Released episode 2 of the tech:lounge video course on wolkenkit ğŸ‰
content: Today, we have released the second episode of the tech:lounge video course on wolkenkit. To watch the video head over to [techlounge.io/wolkenkit](https://www.techlounge.io/wolkenkit).

title: Released episode 1 of the tech:lounge video course on wolkenkit ğŸ˜Š
content: Today, we have released the first episode of the tech:lounge video course on wolkenkit. To watch the video head over to [techlounge.io/wolkenkit](https://www.techlounge.io/wolkenkit).

title: Released wolkenkit-nevercompletedgame 1.0.0 ğŸ¦„
content: Today, we have released wolkenkit-nevercompletedgame 1.0.0 as another sample application for wolkenkit. The code is available in the GitHub repository [thenativeweb/wolkenkit-nevercompletedgame](https://github.com/thenativeweb/wolkenkit-nevercompletedgame).

title: Released wolkenkit-todomvc 1.0.0 ğŸŠ
content: Today, we have released wolkenkit-todomvc 1.0.0 as a sample application for wolkenkit. The code is available in the GitHub repository [thenativeweb/wolkenkit-todomvc](https://github.com/thenativeweb/wolkenkit-todomvc).

title: Released wolkenkit-console 0.2.0 ğŸ‰
content: Today, we have released wolkenkit-console 0.2.0. The new version now supports OpenID Connect to allow working as an authenticated user. Download it from [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/wolkenkit-console) or use it [online](https://console.wolkenkit.io/).

title: Released wolkenkit-console 0.1.2 ğŸ˜Š
content: A few days ago, we have released wolkenkit-console 0.1.2. It allows you to test your application's backend interactively without the need to build a UI. You can download it from [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/wolkenkit-console) or use it [online](https://console.wolkenkit.io/).

title: Released wolkenkit 1.1.0 ğŸ¦„
content: Today, we have released wolkenkit 1.1.0. You can now run wolkenkit on Windows. For the lovely details see the [changelog](https://docs.wolkenkit.io/1.1.0/getting-started/updating-wolkenkit/changelog/).

title: Improved Docker compatibility ğŸ³
content: Today, we have released version 1.0.2 of the wolkenkit CLI. It enables you to run wolkenkit on Docker 17.05 and above. To update the CLI to the latest version, see [Updating the CLI](https://docs.wolkenkit.io/1.0.1/getting-started/updating-wolkenkit/updating-the-cli/).

title: Released wolkenkit 1.0.1 ğŸŠ
content: Today, we have released wolkenkit 1.0.1. It contains a fix for an error that occured while initializing new wolkenkit applications.

title: Hello wolkenkit ğŸ‰
content: Finally, we have released wolkenkit, a semantic JavaScript backend. It empowers you to setup an API for your business to bridge the language gap between your domain and technology. [Want to get started?](https://docs.wolkenkit.io/1.0.0/getting-started/understanding-wolkenkit/why-wolkenkit/)
